name: Penny Theatre
description:
A third year group project, where we were set a live brief of "The One Room".

CREDITS:

Eric Bergner - Character sprites, Environment art, Story, Concept

Matthew Harris - Character control, Camera programming, Level setup, Environment animation

Oliver Lancashire - UI programming, UI design, Asset sourcing

Aidan McHugh - Game manager, Item system, Game progression, Placeholder textures

SPECIAL THANKS:

Marcelo de Souza Viera Júnior - Music

Charlie Guiver - Voice of theater owner
